ConfigManagementItem.add()[source]¶
ConfigManagementItem.ask()[source]¶

Smart wizard which asks user for configuration information. Result is a filled in self.params dictionary with simple name-value pairs To be implemented in subclass.

ConfigManagementItem.show()[source]¶
ConfigManagementItem.validate()[source]¶

Check that configuration is consistent. This happens by dry-running the ask() method and detecting whether config keys are missing or not matching constraints.

ConfigManagementItem.wrappedAsk()[source]¶

Wrapper around ask function. Here we can do things such as input buffer flushing and adding newlines when running in an action

class JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.GroupConfigManagement[source]¶

Bases: object

Classes inheriting from GroupConfigManagement will be put on i tree. Serves for configuration of a collection of ConfigManagementItem classes.

class JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.SingleConfigManagement[source]¶

Bases: object

Classes inheriting from ConfigManagement will be put on i tree. Serves for configuration of a single ConfigManagementItem class.

JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.autoCast(x)[source]¶
JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.generateGroupConfigManagementMethods(**kwargs)[source]¶

Generate UI-visible config management methods for Group config objects. (i.e. config objects which have multiple instances)

JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.generateSingleConfigManagementMethods(**kwargs)[source]¶

Generate UI-visible config management methods for Single config objects. (i.e. config objects which have only one ‘main’ section and no other sections)

JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.isValidInifileKeyName(key)[source]¶

Check that this key name is valid to be used in inifiles, and to be used as a python property name on a q or i object

JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.isValidInifileSectionName(section)[source]¶

Check that this section name is valid to be used in inifiles, and to be used as a python property name on a q or i object

JumpScale.core.config.IConfigBase.isValidInifileValue(value)[source]¶

JumpScale.core.config.JConfig module¶

class JumpScale.core.config.JConfig.JConfig[source]¶

jumpscale singleton class available under j.config Meant for non interactive access to configuration items

getConfig(configtype, directory='jsconfig')[source]¶

Return dict of dicts for this configuration. E.g. { ‘jumpscale.org’ : {url:’http://jumpscale.org’, login=’test’} ,

‘trac.qlayer.com’ : {url:’http://trac.qlayer.com’, login=’mylogin’} }
getInifile(configtype, directory='jsconfig')[source]¶
list()[source]¶

List all configuration types available.
